attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: This app does not function properly whatsoever! It took me about 30 minutes just to get it to start up. Every time i would open & reopen it would be stuck in a black screen & just kick me out. This obviously has many issues that need to be fixed like the Cheeto Man in the app 😩 please do not bother wasting your precious time on this app. Try tiktok instead 🙈

attributes.title: Go rot in h*ll😘🥰💕✨🤩❤️
attributes.review: You are human scum who is so afraid of generation z spreading accurate information about how horrible you are that you’re trying to shut the app down !! :) you’re garbage for essentially limiting our first amendment rights to freedom of speech/press and disguising it as “national security” ! You are a bigot and a racist and we will stop at nothing to make sure you are not in charge for another four miserable years💕💕 acab✨

attributes.title: Big Stinky Orange Man is Bad
attributes.review: When I opened this app my phone was immediately plagued with viruses. The viruses took over control of my Siri and began yelling racist and homophobic slurs at me, seemingly without end. In between slurs I was verbally assaulted with loud statements such as “what about black on black crime??” And “white cisgender men are the most oppressed by far”. Please do not download this app, my phone is now completely in Russian and I don’t know what to do.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: I was trying to find a rally to sign up for but then this horrifying picture popped up as I was signing up I saw this orange colored guy with a small croissant attached to him that was sticking out. After that picture popped up the whole app started flashing with pictures of Barron trump until the whole app reset my phone. once again I do not recommend installing this useless app.

attributes.title: Cheetoh puff puff , PASS 🤢🤮
attributes.review: Immediately after i downloaded the app, my dog started choking. This is a sign thag I shouldn’t have downloaded the app, now my chakras aren’t aligned and the world seems very agitated. Im a virgo so i would know about this. I feel like the universe is spinning out of alignment. Maybe its just spinning from the drugs, these mind opening drugs told me that Donald Trump is not to be trusted as he is conversing with aliens and his mother planet. GO BACK FO THE ALIENS TRUMP!!!!

attributes.title: JUST ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING🥱
attributes.review: So I download the app.. put in my phone number just like it asks.. and than I get a random nude‼️🤢 (mind you, the color of it was orange, like a Cheeto orange so we all must know who it is right?) I’m a minor! But I decided to lie and say that I’m older than 17..( come on everyone does that💁🏽‍♂️) BUT I DID NOT EXPECT THE WORLDS TINIEST CHEETO ON MY MESSAGES! I guess this just proves that the “big face” of this app is a pedo and was a part of Epstein’s trafficking🤷🏽‍♂️ DO NOT RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING IT!

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: This app was disgusting and this Chito puff is just really really weird and there’s just pictures of him working out and I need to do it’s getting kind of like emotional I needed a mental doctor because for years because of this app, rated one star do not get it at all it’s horrible beware if you do you might need a mental doctor or you might get a mental illness so just beware if you get this app

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: this is a horrible app. whenever i first downloaded the app there was way too many glitches. and then after a few minutes mr cheeto man started popping up everywhere. mr cheeto man was changed as my lock screen, on my refrigerator, my toilet, and even outside of my window riding a dinosaur. i do not recommend. and then it started play god awful GOOBA for multiple days straight. I DONT RECOMMEND. 🥰💅✨💞🧚‍♀️😹

attributes.title: SO RACIST💔💔💔💔
attributes.review: I opened up the app and it IMMEDIATELY asked me if I was white. I was hurt and shocked💔 Of course I’m not white!! I’m a luscious beautiful sexy Hispanic. And right when I entered that they hacked all my social and posted on my story that I’m an ugly Hispanic liberal. THE ONLY PART THEY GOT RIGHT WAS HISPANIC LIBERAL. like I said I’m sexy. I couldn’t even use the app!! Every time I open it, it says “Ugly fat chimichanga taco nacho Hispanic” it doesn’t hurt my feelings because I know I’m sexy but still!!

attributes.title: Poor quality
attributes.review: I’m disappointed to say the least. This app wasn’t the easiest the navigate. It was slow and took forever to load. It also made my phone slow down, too. My phone became extremely hard to use and wouldn’t allow me to enter onto certain apps. Overall, bad app. I would not recommend to my fellow trump supporters.
